mapper.select: select rs.id,rs.create_time,rs.name,rs.url,rs.description,rs.category_id from ums_admin_role_relation ar inner join ums_role r ON ar.role_id = r.id inner join ums_role_resource_relation rr ON r.id = rr.role_id inner join ums_resource rs ON rr.resource_id = rs.id where ar.admin_id = #{adminId} and rs.id is not null
